mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (reservation_number, imp_uid, merchant, serialnumber, room_id, userid, checkin_date, checkout_date, price, count_room, lastname, firstname, special_request, time_arrival, status, email, pincode, hotelname) VALUES (nextval('seq_reservation'), #{imp_uid}, #{merchant}, ${serialnumber}, ${room_id}, #{userid}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{price}, #{count_room}, #{lastname}, #{firstname}, #{request_text}, ${arrive_time}, ${status}, #{email}, #{pincode}, #{hotelname})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.reservation_number, r.imp_uid, r.merchant, r.room_id, r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, r.userid, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, r.reservation_date, r.lastname, r.status, r.cancel_date, r.cancel_reason, r.firstname, r.price, r.pincode, r.time_arrival, r.count_room, i.file_url, h.city FROM reservation as r LEFT JOIN hotel_image as i ON r.serialnumber = i.serialnumber LEFT JOIN temphotel as h ON r.serialnumber = h.serialnumber WHERE r.userid = #{userid}
order by r.checkin_date desc

SELECT r.reservation_number, r.imp_uid, r.merchant, r.room_id, r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, r.userid, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, r.reservation_date, r.lastname, r.status, r.cancel_date, r.cancel_reason, r.firstname, r.price, r.pincode, r.time_arrival, r.count_room, i.file_url, h.city FROM reservation as r LEFT JOIN hotel_image as i ON r.serialnumber = i.serialnumber LEFT JOIN temphotel as h ON r.serialnumber = h.serialnumber WHERE r.reservation_number = #{reservation_number}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation set status = #{status}, cancel_date = TO_DATE(#{cancel_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), cancel_reason = #{cancel_reason} where merchant = #{merchant}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservation WHERE reservation_number IN (SELECT reservation_number FROM (SELECT reservation_number, row_number() over (partition BY merchant ORDER BY reservation_number) AS rnum FROM reservation) t WHERE t.rnum > 1)
mapper.select:
SELECT current_date as today, r.reservation_number, r.imp_uid, r.merchant, r.room_id, r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, r.userid, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, r.reservation_date, r.lastname, r.status, r.cancel_date, r.cancel_reason, r.firstname, r.price, r.pincode, r.time_arrival, r.count_room, i.file_url, h.city FROM reservation as r LEFT JOIN hotel_image as i ON r.serialnumber = i.serialnumber LEFT JOIN temphotel as h ON r.serialnumber = h.serialnumber WHERE r.userid = #{userid} and r.checkin_date > current_date
order by r.checkin_date desc

SELECT current_date as today, (r.checkout_date + 30) - current_date as review_deadline, r.reservation_number, r.imp_uid, r.merchant, r.room_id, r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, r.userid, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, r.reservation_date, r.lastname, r.status, r.cancel_date, r.cancel_reason, r.use_status, r.firstname, r.price, r.pincode, r.time_arrival, r.count_room, i.file_url, h.city FROM reservation as r LEFT JOIN hotel_image as i ON r.serialnumber = i.serialnumber LEFT JOIN temphotel as h ON r.serialnumber = h.serialnumber WHERE r.userid = #{userid} and (r.checkout_date + 30) > current_date and r.use_status = 2 and review != true
order by r.checkin_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation set review = true where reservation_number = #{reservation_number}
mapper.select: SELECT r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, t.city, t.star, hi.file_url, count(*) FROM reservation as r LEFT JOIN temphotel AS t ON r.serialnumber = t.serialnumber LEFT JOIN hotel_image AS hi ON r.serialnumber = hi.serialnumber GROUP BY r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, t.city, t.star, hi.file_url LIMIT 6
